00021 #include "DataGroupHeaderReader.h"
00022 #include "DataSetHeaderReaderTest.h"
00023 #include "FileHeaderReader.h"

00025 const std::string TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE = "../data/test.file.data_dat";
00026 
00027 using namespace std;
00028 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00029 
00030 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( DataSetHeaderReaderTest );
00031 
00032 void DataSetHeaderReaderTest::setUp()
00033 {
00034         is.open(TEST_DATA_DAT_FILE.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
00035 }
00036 
00037 void DataSetHeaderReaderTest::tearDown()
00038 {
00039         is.close();
00040         fh.Clear();
00041 }

00043 void DataSetHeaderReaderTest::CreationTest()
00044 {
00045         DataSetHeaderReader dphReader;
00046         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);
00047 }
00048 
00049 void DataSetHeaderReaderTest::ReadOneDataSetHeaderTest()
00050 {
00051         FileHeaderReader fhReader(is, fh);
00052         fhReader.Read();
00053 
00054         DataGroupHeader dch;
00055         DataGroupHeaderReader dchReader;
00056         dchReader.ReadHeader(is, dch);
00057 
00058         // File position is at the start of the first DataSetHeader in the first DataGroup
00059         DataSetHeader dph;
00060         DataSetHeaderReader dphReader;
00061         u_int32_t nextDataSet = 0;
00062         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(nextDataSet = dphReader.Read(is, dph));
00063 
00064         // Check the DataSetHeader information was read
00065         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph.GetName() == L"acquired data");
00066         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph.GetDataStartFilePos() != 0);
00067         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph.GetNameValParamCnt() == 2);
00068         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph.GetRowSize() == sizeof(u_int16_t));
00069         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph.GetDataSize() == sizeof(u_int16_t)*100);
00070         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph.GetRowCnt() == 100);
00071         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph.GetColumnCnt() == 1);
00072         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph.GetDataStartFilePos() == 0x3A0);
00073 
00074         // Check the data dataSet name value pairs
00075         ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt nvpBegin, nvpEnd;
00076         dph.GetNameValIterators(nvpBegin, nvpEnd);
00077         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin != nvpEnd);
00078         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetName() == L"Scanner");
00079         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetValueText() == L"M10");
00080         ++nvpBegin;
00081         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin != nvpEnd);
00082         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetName() == L"Pixel Size");
00083         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetValueFloat() == 0.051f);
00084         ++nvpBegin;
00085         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin == nvpEnd);
00086 }
00087 
00088 void DataSetHeaderReaderTest::ReadMinimumInfoForOneDataSetHeaderTest()
00089 {
00090         FileHeaderReader fhReader(is, fh);
00091         fhReader.Read();
00092 
00093         DataGroupHeader dch;
00094         DataGroupHeaderReader dchReader;
00095         dchReader.ReadHeader(is, dch);
00096 
00097         // File position is at the start of the first DataSetHeader in the first DataGroup
00098         DataSetHeader dph;
00099         DataSetHeaderReader dphReader;
00100         u_int32_t nextDataSet = 0;
00101         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(nextDataSet = dphReader.ReadMinimumInfo(is, dph));
00102 
00103         // Check that the minimum DataSetHeader information was read.
00104         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph.GetName() == L"acquired data");
00105         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph.GetDataStartFilePos() != 0);
00106         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph.GetNameValParamCnt() == 0);
00107         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph.GetRowSize() == 0);
00108         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph.GetDataSize() == 0);
00109         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph.GetRowCnt() == 0);
00110         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph.GetColumnCnt() == 0);
00111         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph.GetDataStartFilePos() == 0x3A0);
00112 }
00113 
00114 void DataSetHeaderReaderTest::ReadAllTest()
00115 {
00116         FileHeaderReader fhReader(is, fh);
00117         fhReader.Read();
00118 
00119         DataGroupHeader dch;
00120         DataGroupHeaderReader dchReader;
00121         dchReader.ReadHeader(is, dch);
00122 
00123         int32_t dpCount = 1; // fh.GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSetCnt(); is not ready at this time
00124 
00125         // File position is at the start of the first DataSetHeader in the first DataGroup
00126         DataSetHeaderReader dphReader;
00127         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dphReader.ReadAll(is, dch, dpCount));
00128 
00129         // Check that the right number of DataSets were read
00130         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dch.GetDataSetCnt() == 1);
00131 
00132         // Check the DataSetHeader information was read
00133         DataSetHdrIt dphBegin, dphEnd;
00134         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dch.GetDataSetIterators(dphBegin,dphEnd));
00135         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin != dphEnd);
00136         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetName() == L"acquired data");
00137         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataStartFilePos() != 0);
00138         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetNameValParamCnt() == 2);
00139         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetRowSize() == sizeof(u_int16_t));
00140         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataSize() == sizeof(u_int16_t)*100);
00141         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetRowCnt() == 100);
00142         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetColumnCnt() == 1);
00143         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataStartFilePos() == 0x3A0);
00144 
00145         // Check the DataSetHeader name value pairs
00146         ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt nvpBegin, nvpEnd;
00147         dphBegin->GetNameValIterators(nvpBegin, nvpEnd);
00148         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin != nvpEnd);
00149         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetName() == L"Scanner");
00150         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetValueText() == L"M10");
00151         ++nvpBegin;
00152         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin != nvpEnd);
00153         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetName() == L"Pixel Size");
00154         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin->GetValueFloat() == 0.051f);
00155         ++nvpBegin;
00156         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvpBegin == nvpEnd);
00157 
00158         // Check the data dataSet columns
00159         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetColumnInfo(0).GetName() == L"Pixel");
00160         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetColumnInfo(0).GetColumnType() == UShortColType);
00161         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetColumnInfo(0).GetSize() == sizeof(u_int16_t));
00162 
00163         // Check that there are not any more DataSetHeaders
00164         ++dphBegin;
00165         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin == dphEnd);
00166 }
00167 
00168 void DataSetHeaderReaderTest::ReadAllMinimumInfoTest()
00169 {
00170         FileHeaderReader fhReader(is, fh);
00171         fhReader.Read();
00172 
00173         DataGroupHeader dch;
00174         DataGroupHeaderReader dchReader;
00175         dchReader.ReadHeader(is, dch);
00176 
00177         int32_t dpCount = 1; // fh.GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSetCnt(); is not ready at this time
00178 
00179         // File position is at the start of the first DataSetHeader in the first DataGroup
00180         DataSetHeaderReader dphReader;
00181         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dphReader.ReadAllMinimumInfo(is, dch, dpCount));
00182 
00183         // Check that the right number of DataSets were read
00184         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dch.GetDataSetCnt() == 1);
00185 
00186         // Check that the minimum DataSetHeader information was read.
00187         DataSetHdrIt dphBegin, dphEnd;
00188         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(dch.GetDataSetIterators(dphBegin,dphEnd));
00189         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetName() == L"acquired data");
00190         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataStartFilePos() != 0);
00191         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetNameValParamCnt() == 0);
00192         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetRowSize() == 0);
00193         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataSize() == 0);
00194         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetRowCnt() == 0);
00195         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetColumnCnt() == 0);
00196         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin->GetDataStartFilePos() == 0x3A0);
00197 
00198         // Check that there are not any more DataSetHeaders
00199         ++dphBegin;
00200         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dphBegin == dphEnd);
00201 }
